com.samsung.android.service.health.tracking.data

Class ValueKey.PpgRedSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.service.health.tracking.data.ValueKey.PpgRedSet
  • Enclosing class:
    ValueKey<T>
    Deprecated. 
    ValueKey.PpgRedSet is deprecated. Use ValueKey.PpgSet instead.

    This class is a data set for tracking HealthTrackerType.PPG_RED.


    @Deprecated
public static class ValueKey.PpgRedSet
extends Object
    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    HealthTracker.TrackerEventListener.onDataReceived(List<DataPoint>)
    DataPoint

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ValueKey<Integer> PPG_RED
      Deprecated. 
      ValueKey.PpgRedSet is deprecated. Use ValueKey.PpgSet instead of it.

      Photoplethysmogram (PPG) Red's raw value.

      static ValueKey<Integer> STATUS
      Deprecated. 
      ValueKey.PpgRedSet is deprecated. Use ValueKey.PpgSet instead of it.

      Status flag for PPG Red data tracking.

      The available values are:

        Status value Description
        -999 Error value
        0 Normal value
        500 The STATUS interface is not supported. This is caused by the Galaxy Watch software version being too old.
